name: Basement Builder
tagline: Editor for Binding of Isaac: Rebirth Stage Bundles
body:
### Basement Builder
Basement Builder is a stage editor for Binding of Isaac: Rebirth. It allows you to modify rooms to show in the game. Basement Builder is forked from Basement Renovator made by Tempus.

### Authors
* Tempus - creator of Basement Renovator
* /u/Jean-Alphonse - contributor of code related to custom entities
* Zatherz (/u/Zatherz) - creator of fork, contributor of code for Plasma 5 support and other
* /u/Asterne - helped resolve Plasma 5-related problem

### GitHub repository
Basement Builder is located [here](https://github.com/zatherz/basementbuilder).

### How to run
On Linux or Mac OS X, just install Python 3, PyQt 5 and run the Python script: `python BasementBuilder.py` in the root directory.

On Microsoft Windows, download the [bundled executable]() and double click on it to start Basement Builder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
